content.body: I’m looking at simplifying Ecma262’s definition of Array.from to use %Array.prototype.values%, like how https://tc39.es/proposal-array-from-async/#sec-array.fromAsync uses %Array.prototype.values%. As far as I can tell, this should be editorial, but, if so, would it still deserve to be presented as a 2022-09 plenary agenda item?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I’m looking at simplifying Ecma262’s definition of Array.from to use %Array.prototype.values%, like how https://tc39.es/proposal-array-from-async/#sec-array.fromAsync uses %Array.prototype.values%.
